derivation: neuter of G4413 (πρῶτον) as adverb (with or without G3588 (πρῶτον));
kjv_def: before, at the beginning, chiefly (at, at the) first (of all)
strongs_def: firstly (in time, place, order, or importance)
outline:
1. first in time or place
    1. in any succession of things or persons
  2. first in rank
    1. influence, honour
    2. chief
    3. principal
  3. first, at the first
